TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content:
What's the official food of the Hype Train?

HypeCoal, duh! And I don't mean for the train itself. I mean... we eat HypeCoal.

*ahem*

Budget cuts.

What's the official food of the Hype Train?

Pizza.

Ten characters.
Am I the only one who - when the devnotes are this late with a pending launch imminent - starts to wonder if they're late for a very good and very exciting reason?

Am I the only one who - when the devnotes are this late with a pending launch imminent - starts to wonder if they're late for a very good and very exciting reason?

The best reason I can think of is that they are working hard, if you mean release, no.

Am I the only one who - when the devnotes are this late with a pending launch imminent - starts to wonder if they're late for a very good and very exciting reason?

Not the only one! But sometimes it can be a sad reason, like "Oh crap, I forgot about the devnotes" or "We're working too hard, no devnotes today" or "HarvesteR just died in a HypeTrain related injury"

I really hope it's not the latter.
Edited the OP with a few minor new details about stuff.
Experimentals update again...

I got a hypetrain ticket for 9001th class!

(note:9001th class is the best and almost everyone has it)
HYPE 07A has a retractable facecam, so at a set time we can call her and have her answer questions to hypemuseum people

I've been away from the game for several months...can anyone confirm if the 64 bit issues are going to be addressed in this update?

Also, is it too late for a hypetrain ticket?

I've been away from the game for several months...can anyone confirm if the 64 bit issues are going to be addressed in this update?

Also, is it too late for a hypetrain ticket?

1. Not that I know of.

2. Nope, it's never to late, until it is.

It's never to late, until it is.

when it is means when the hypetrain pulls in
Are we there yet?

Are we there yet?

Nope, and SteamDB hasn't been updated today...

Are we there yet?

no. want a book on the history of hypetrains? we are selling them in the gift car.

no. want a book on the history of hypetrains? we are selling them in the gift car.

How many cars does this thing have?
It needs to hurry up and release so the new version of Texture Manager can hurry and take its 3 hour first time load so I can play sooner :-(

The hypetrain, I think, has OVER 9000 CARS well, more just 9001 BUT STILL

Gregrox, am I right?
Calling it right now. Squad Tuesday, anyone?
Unless something terribly buggy and unforeseen happens, we just may be getting a release next week! (or the week after, I'm not opening the Hype Throttle all the way just yet)

"Extrapolate whatever info you want"

Clearly, SQUAD is trolling us and the "features video" will just be a selfie of Max, with a 30-second voice clip telling us the basic points of 0.90.0.

Right?

No steamDB update in 24 hours...
